item.title: about me
item.description: current assistant professor of statistics Econometric Institute, Erasmus School of Economics, Erasmus University Rotterdam past research fellow of statistics Department of Law and Economics, UnitelmaSapienza University of Rome education dutch university teaching qualification (BKO) Risbo - Erasmus University Rotterdam (2022) phd in methodological statistics at La Sapienza University of Rome (2020) msc in statistics and decision sciences at La Sapienza University of Rome (2016) bsc in statistics at La Sapienza University of Rome (2013) qualifications National Qualification for Associate Professor (Italy, ASN II fascia), Statistics (SC 13/D1, June-2023) awards and grants IFCS Chikio Hayashi award (1000.
